@js:
function sign(list){
    var sb='p33d3d7giyv8hlsd';
    list=list.sort();
    for(var i=0;i<list.length;i++){if(i==0){sb+=list[i];}else{sb+="&";sb+=list[i];}}
    sb+="ac9de0edzhozh5fwcqi3bn0w5cqvht0u";
    return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase();
}
time=Math.round(new Date()/1000);
list=["book_id="+java.get('bid'),"chapter_id="+result[0],"scroll_type=1","packageName=com.letuapp.reader","time="+time,"token=","marketChannel=xiaomi","appId=","sysVer=7.1.2","osType=2","udid=1f705dac-2eec-3045-96be-713264df32c2","ver=1.4.1","product=1"];
body={"sign":sign(list),"book_id":String(java.get('bid')),"chapter_id":String(result[0]),"scroll_type":"1","packageName":"com.letuapp.reader","time":time,"token":"","marketChannel":"xiaomi","appId":"","sysVer":"7.1.2","osType":"2","udid":"1f705dac-2eec-3045-96be-713264df32c2","ver":"1.4.1","product":"1"};
option={"method":"POST","body":JSON.stringify(body)};
"/chapter/new-catalog," + JSON.stringify(option);

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function dec(str){
      var key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("a2Fuc2h1anNvbnRlc3QAAA=="),"AES");
      var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray(JSON.parse(result).iv));
      var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return java.base64Decode(String(chipher.doFinal(bytes)));
    }
}
dec(JSON.parse(result).content)
</js>
